title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck
title_original: LYANER Women's Casual Shirt Dress Collar V Neck Button Down Loose Long Sleeve Mini Dresses

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #8,197 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #48 in Women's Casual Dresses

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Dresses > Casual

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress chic and well-made, with excellent cotton material that feels like high-end fabric. They appreciate its versatility, noting it can be worn as a dress or with a tunic, and one customer mentions it pairs well with leggings and boots. The color maintains its vibrancy after washing, and customers find it comfortable. The sizing and length receive mixed feedback - while some find the large size fits perfectly, others say it runs large, and while some consider the length perfect for tall people, others find it too short. Select to learn more Style Quality Material quality Color Dressability Comfort Size Length 156 customers mention "Style" 144 positive 12 negative Customers find the dress chic and say it looks just like the listing, though some note it's only suitable for one wear. "This is a cute , flattering dress. However! Washed on delicate, low, dried on delicate low. It is now a cute shirt for a child...." Read more "This is classy & beautiful ! It is a bit too big for me so I will exchange for one size smaller. Love the weight of it!" Read more "Disregard the wrinkles! This is super cute and color exactly as expected!! Perfect fabric weight-not see through! The length is just right...." items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent
items.body: The quality is amazing, its a thick dress shirt material and the sizing is true to size...looks great as a dress and with leggings on a cool day Read more
items.author: michellle polk

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful, I use it as a blouse over pants
items.body: This is a stand-out blouse. I wear it over pants, though obviously someone younger can wear it as a dress. The fabric is wonderful, great weight, and really doesn't need ironing, though I do a light ironing as I like a really crisp look. The color was true to the picture. Read more
items.author: Virginia Sanders Mylius

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE IT!!
items.body: This shirt/tunic/dress is so pretty. It's a big top, lots of room to move around in. Very well made light to medium weight cotton top. Not see through. Can be worn as dress or with tunic. It comes to my knees. Nice enough for work and fun enough for a shopping trip. Great top for the price! Read more
items.author: joessandy

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Don’t size up or it could look like sleep wear
items.body: 4 stars because it would be perfect if it was a bit longer. Super cute. Great fit. Very flattering for all body types. Cut has is a-line. No need for pear shapes to size up to accommodate hips and be left with the oversized sloppy look because the top portion is too big. This is great for pear shapes. Great for busty girls, rulers and apples. Length is short if you get your true size. It’s a bit longer if you size up but it will look more like a sleep shirt. Please just buy your normal size and wear with cute leggings boy shorts. This needs to be worn with fitted pants. It can be worn as a dress but you will need to wear shorts underneath. I wore as a dress but it was really short and my over the arm bag kept making it ride up on one side. Colors are vibrant. Material is crisp like a new fine tailored men’s shirt. Construction is spot on. Haven’t washed it yet, but we shall see. Pray it won’t shrink. I ordered several in different colors because I can wear them out or use them to walk around house looking super cute. This is the look sexy without trying too hard outfit you need to walk around the house. Instead of looking frumpy, get this shirt dress and always keep yourself looking effortlessly cute. Just shower, throw this on and you’ll look great for yourself, your significant other or if someone stops by your house. Read more
items.author: Lulu

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I bought seven!
items.body: I love it so much that I bought seven ( so far)! I am 70 yo. 5'9" and 160-165 lbs. And I live in Florida. Can't wear it as a dress( too short), but they will look fabulous with leggings or pants. The material is high quality and it is made very well. I ironed one and added some starch to the collar, and it looked great all day. They do need ironing before wearing, but they stay looking good. They are oversized, but stylishly so. I bought a large and had plenty of room. My favorite attribute is the band along the bottom. Makes it look classy and expensive. Great addition to any wardrobe. Now off to order other colors! Read more
items.author: THOMAS R. GOODNOUGH

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get it!!!
items.body: Love this shirt dresses. Cute and comfortable. Must buy. Read more
items.author: Eagle's Girl

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Quality Build, But Too High Maintenance
items.body: This shirt is well made and feels durable right out of the package, but the upkeep is a nightmare. The material wrinkles badly and ironing it takes forever . Throwing it in the dryer just makes it worse. Even washing it in cold water caused the color to fade noticeably after one wash. For the price, I expected it to hold up better and be easier to care for. Runs true to size for that over sized look. Read more
items.author: Mrs. Reed

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Run a size bigger than normal. Cool, crisp, fast wash/dry
items.body: Perfect for travel. Cool, crisp, easy wash and hang dry by morning. I WAY overpacked because I had no idea I'd just repeatedly cycle through a black, army green, and white version of this shirt with different loose cotton/linen pants almost the entire trip. Dress up with cute flats or dress down with Hey Dudes. Great either way. I'm back now to get two more colors. Note: These DEFINITELY run oversized. If you size up, just know it'll double as a sleep dress. I ended up keeping the XXL for just that and reordered in XL for day wear. Read more
items.author: Cammm

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Rose, Army Green, Ginger, Baby Blue, Beige, Light Pure Dark Khaki, Light Pure Brown, Royal Blue, Light Pink, Light Purple, Pure Gray, Solid Black, Turquoise, Light Pure Deep Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
